data.title: A Site And Showers Default Stars
data.description: Use these stars to gain early control of Showers, and/or deny information to Defenders playing U-Hall.

data.title: Default Hookah Control Gravity Well + Nova Pulse
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective way in taking Hookah control. This combination will isolate Defenders inside, and prevent them from leaving.

data.title: B Site Default Smokes
data.description: The default smokes that you can use when pushing onto B Site.

data.title: B Garden to B Cubby Gravity Well
data.description: This is a good gravity well and nova pulse combo that will leave your target disoriented and allow you to get an easy kill.
